values:
nm nm....got back from camp....made awesome friends.  It was awesome.  I went to church conference and met some hot guys (lance uppercut...:))  This week everyone's at efy...but i didn't go.  Was supposed to go to dirtbike camp with lorianne..didn't work out...Was supposed to party on with natalie..didn't work out..so i sit here and watch seinfeld....(Newman rocks my world)  Finished my entire Pre AP Bio assignment in 24 hours!!!!  Still haven't got a good start on block though......don't think i will...I'm a Pirate...and a YOYO..thank you avalon for including me in my moment of need!!!!  Miriam you are righteous too...I will marry fred in a double wedding with avalon and george.  I'm going to write in this thing more often...it's kind of cool...well....ttul

Sam, Slave, Spazzy McGee, Yoyo, Lola, Stupid one, Melissa Dean, 

SHAM & M N M forever

1. Who are you?
2. Are we friends?
3. When and how did we meet?
4. Do you have a crush on me?
5. Would you kiss me?
6. Give me a nickname and explain why you picked it.
7. Describe me in one word.
8. What was your first impression?
9. Do you still think that way about me now?
10. What reminds you of me?
11. If you could give me anything what would it be?
12. How well do you know me?
13. When's the last time you saw me?
14. Ever wanted to tell me something but couldn't?
15. Are you going to put this on your LiveJournal and see what I say about you?

Last day of school!!!  Yes!!!!  Ecstatic jig!!  Found out i had a 91 in gemoetry...much joy.....!!!

American Idol finale tonight...the phone things are rigged..latoya london so should have won..oh well..she'll get a record deal anyway

Friday i'm going to nick m's house..hanging with his hott friends..that should be fun....kind of confused about it.

Ever been confused about who you like...someone likes you but you don't like them back..and then you like someone and they don't like you back...well that's my life right now..awesome


keep it rockin

melissa

Wow..here's what i did on saturday:

studied for geometry

wrote my speech thing for church

contemplated natalie's plan to sit in her locker...thought about joining her...decided i would

got online for 15 minutes and got discouraged about the geometry final

contemplated my ugly face

contemplated how someone was practically my best friend last year and this year really doesn't like me

contemplated how some people i judged last year are my friends this year

overall...contemplated and studied

I feel happy now....blubberbutt500 added me to their friends list..gives me joy..have to figure out who that is

This song by relient k reminds me of gnatalie:

so it was jeremy in 1983
in his ocean pacific t
who got a bloody knee
on his skateboard
in the half pipe
in the backyard
that tuesday night
and i'm only gonna pierce my left ear
and i've been working on this mustache all summer long
and my favorite band will always be tears for fears
and i'm gonna wear a pink tux to the prom
cutting class through the first floor window
he's driving fast cause he never did a thing slow
and i look up to my big bro
cause in the 80's all the ladies grabbed his hand and couldn't let go
and i'm only gonna pierce my left ear
and i've been working on this mustache all summer long
and my favorite band will always be tears for fears
and i'm gonna wear a pink tux to the prom (a pink tux to the prom)
doo doo, a doo doo doo
pink tux to the prom
doo doo, a doo doo doo
pink tux to the prom
i am gonna wear a pink tux to the prom
live without a care...what could possibly go wrong?
when you're president of the breakfast club
and you're not hesitant to fall in love (to fall in love)
to throw it away to fall in love with the 80's
i am gonna wear a pink tux to the prom
live without a care...what could possibly go wrong?
i am gonna wear a pink tux to the prom
live without a care...
cause you threw it away to fall in love with the 80's
doo doo, a doo doo
doo doo, a doo doo
doo doo, a doo doo

Love Melissa

I ____ Melissa.

Melissa is ____.

If I were alone in a room with Melissa, I would _______.

I think Melissa should _____.

Melissa needs ______.

Melissa will never ______.

I want to _________ Melissa.

Melissa can ______ my _______.

When I think about Melissa, I ______.

you must fill this out before you can steal it and put it on your journal!


This is intriguing and i love it!

Melissa

Maybe when the room is empty,
maybe when the bottle's full,
maybe when the door gets broke down love can break in.
Maybe when I'm done with thinking
maybe you can think me whole
maybe when I'm done with endings this can begin.
This can begin
This can begin
If you could be my punk rock princess,
I would be your garage band king.
You could tell my why you just don't fit in, and how your gonna be somethin'
Maybe when your hair gets darker
maybe when your eyes get wide
maybe when the walls are smaller there will be more space.
Maybe when I'm not so tired
maybe you can step inside
maybe when I look for things that I can't replace
I can't replace
I can't replace
If you could be my punk rock princess
I would be your garage band king
You could tell my why you just don't fit in, and how your gonna be something
If I could be your first real heartache I would do it over again.
If you could be my punk rock princess you could be my heroin.
I never thought you'd last
I never dreamed you would.
You watch your life go past
you wonder if you should ...
If you should be my punk rock princess so I would be your garage band king
you could tell my why you just don't fit in, and how your gonna be something.
If I could be your first real heartache, I would do it over again.
If you could be my punk rock princess I would be your heroin.


Whoa Ohhhh, you know, you only burn my bridges
Whoa Ohhhh, you know, you just can't let it sink it.
You could be my heroin
You could be my heroin

I thought celebration was awesome!!!  I love jumpy castles!!!  I thought that brandy's roll move down the slide was awesome!!  
Wow..tomorrow is FHS Battle of the Bands..i'm going to watch Ezra's band play.  it'll be fun..i hear there are jumpy castles there...hmmmmmmmmm

Melissa

Yay!! I'm so excited about my new jornal.  Well..here are some cool lyrics by Yellowcard:
There's a place off Ocean Avenue
Where I used to sit and talk with you
We were both 16 and it felt so right
Sleeping all day, staying up all night
Staying up all night

There's a place on the corner of Cherry Street 
We would walk on the beach in our bare feet
We were both 18 and it felt so right
Sleeping all day, staying up all night
Staying up all night

If I could find you now things would get better
We could leave this town and run forever
Let your waves crash down on me and take me away

There's a piece of you that's here with me
It's everywhere I go, it's everything I see
When I sleep, I dream and it gets me by
I can make believe that you're here tonight
That you're here tonight

If I could find you now things would get better
We could leave this town and run forever
I know somewhere, somehow we'll be together
Let your waves crash down on me and take me away

I remember the look in your eyes
When I told you that this was goodbye
You were begging me not tonight
Not here, not now
We're looking up at the same night sky
And keep pretending the sun will not rise 
Be together for one more night
Somewhere, somehow

If I could find you now things would get better
We could leave this town and run forever
I know somewhere, somehow we'll be together
Let your waves crash down on me and take me away

That is probably the best song in the world.  Wow..last night was really scary.  The house i was spending the night in got struck by lightning.  I was just like sitting there getting ready to watch a movie and then it was like BANG!!  Everyone screamed really loud and we went and hid in the hall thing.  Scary but exciting.  Well..i saw thirteen going on thirty today. It was positively frothy.

~Melissa
